Package monkey.mnk

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • monkey.mnk.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A Position refers to a single cell of the Board. It features bounds checking and helper operations.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int COLUMNSNUMBER
      Number of columns of the board.
      int ROWSNUMBER
      Number of rows of the board.

      Constructs a new Position given an [MNKCell].
      Position​(Board b, int row, int column)
      Constructs a new Position given its parent Board and its coordinates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Position

        public Position​(int rowsNumber,
                int columnsNumber,
                int row,
                int column)
        Constructs a new Position given the numbers of rows and columns and its coordinates.
        Parameters:
        rowsNumber - Number of rows in the grid.
        columnsNumber - Number of columns in the grid.
        row - Row index (starting from zero).
        column - Column index (starting from zero).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - rowsNumber or columnsNumber is negative.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Referring to a Position outside of b's bounds.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Position

        public Position​(Board b,
                int row,
                int column)
        Constructs a new Position given its parent Board and its coordinates.
        Parameters:
        b - Parent Board whose extents are used for bounds checking.
        row - Row index (starting from zero).
        column - Column index (starting from zero).
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - Null Board.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Referring to a Position outside of b's bounds.
        Since:
        1.0

      • Position

        public Position​(int rowsNumber,
                int columnsNumber,
                mnkgame.MNKCell cell)
        Constructs a new Position given an [MNKCell].
        Parameters:
        rowsNumber - Number of rows in the grid.
        columnsNumber - Number of columns in the grid.
        cell - [MNKCell] to be used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - rowsNumber or columnsNumber is negative.
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - Referring to a Position outside of b's bounds.
        Since:
        1.0
